tachyon.worker.block.io

Class LocalFileBlockWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.worker.block.io.LocalFileBlockWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, BlockWriter

    public final class LocalFileBlockWriter
extends Object
implements BlockWriter
    This class provides write access to a temp block data file locally stored in managed storage.

    This class does not provide thread-safety. Corresponding lock must be acquired.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LocalFileBlockWriter(String path)
      Constructs a Block writer given the file path of the block.

      Constructs a Block writer given the metadata of a temp block.
